data.name: ReadAdministrativeAppeal
data.value: select top(1) ADMIN_APPEAL_ID from CKT_ADMIN_APPEAL where ADMIN_APPEAL_ID = @adminAppealId

data.name: ReadPositionStatement
data.value: select top(1) AAP_IDENTIFIER, POSITION_STMT_NO from CKT_POSITION_STMT where (POSITION_STMT_NO = @positionStmtNo) and (@aapIdentifier = AAP_IDENTIFIER)
